TopicTitle: Icarus II - The Most Accurate Recreation To Date

Articles.Content:
I'm sure most everyone here has seen or heard of the movie Sunshine, and if not, you've probably seen people try and recreate the ship Icarus II.

A few of those ships have been decent, but most have been downright bad.

That changes today.

I present, Icarus II.

http://imgur.com/a/S2P0Y#0

^ Imgur album.

For those too lazy to click the above link, here is one one fifteen images.

WARNING:

This ship is massive. The part count is over 1,200.

List of required mods (I think this is all):

Ion Hybrid Engine Pack

Damned Robotics 1.3

Improved Trusses & Girders

Hyperedit (to get it off the ground and into space)

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xl85we1njmliq0m/Icarus%20II.craft

SHIP CONTROLS:

Do NOT use the staging (space bar) to control the vessel.

1 = Activates small radial boosters (meant to pull the large shield and bomb away from Icarus).

2 = Activates shield solid boosters.

4 = Activates Icarus's ion engine.

6 = Decouples Icarus from the large shield.

8 = Toggles instruments and dishes.

9 = Toggles constant rotation on the communication arms.
REALLY impressive! I t looks like everything is there.. now if you only had a frozen pilot glued to the floor of the computer room..
So want to try this, gonna crash it into Jool's atmosphere.
Wow! That's quite the craft. I would love to see what that looks like burning up through an extreme aerobrake
I'm getting a compatibility error. What version was this made in?

Who cares if it's not stock, Jebediah approves.

Though it DOES look like maximum Kraken bait...

I'm getting a compatibility error. What version was this made in?

The latest version.
Kudos to you sir - this is great. I love the "Sunshine", though I'm afraid my PC will implode while trying to fly this beauty.
After spending so much effort on the sunshield, the rest of the craft looks a bit rushed and lacking detail, IMO. But I'm just nitpicking, it looks very good.

After spending so much effort on the sunshield, the rest of the craft looks a bit rushed and lacking detail, IMO. But I'm just nitpicking, it looks very good.

I agree, I could have made Icarus itself much better.

Given the parts that are available, be them stock or from Spaceport, I did the best I could with what I had.

It's also hard to find an accurate model. I used these for most of it:

http://2753productions.com/Icarus2.php
